arts.ttl: DAZN secures exclusive Fifa Club World Cup rights
arts.sum: Streaming platform DAZN secures exclusive rights to broadcast next summer's Fifa Club World Cup.

arts.ttl: When is Atlético San Luis - Monterrey? how to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: The game between Atlético San Luis and Monterrey will be played on Wednesday December 4 at Estadio Alfonso Lastras . Form guide for Atlético San Luis - Monterrey

arts.ttl: Revealed: FIFA confirm pots for 2025 Club World Cup draw - with Chelsea, Man City and Real Madrid all set to feature in the United States tournament
arts.sum: The 2025 Club World Cup will be contested by 32 clubs from the six continental confederations and will be the first edition in this format to take place in the United States.
